title: Create a sankey plot with financial data — plot_sankey
text: data data frame like financial. with_company Logical. TRUE, plot node company name. FALSE, plot without company name node. mode String. Several modes can chosen user : "equal_weight" means divide amount loan number products company. "worst_case" means weigh loan assume money goes highest risk product. two products associated highest risk, assume equal weights . "best_case" - similar worst-case scenario just lowest-risk category. "main_activity" - sometimes banks give one sector classification one company. However, data know sometimes products stem different sectors. Knowing bank categorizes product one specific sector, assume bank finance product sector categories company .
